EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to subscriber after a Closed Won Subscription.
EmailTemplate.name: Subscription Closed Won
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Compliance Week
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Primary_Subscription_Contact__c},
Thank you for joining Compliance Week. As a valued member, you have access to:
News & Analysis -- Hundreds of articles and weekly updates featuring real-world best practices, opinion, and research;
Professional Development -- World class conferences and unrestricted on-demand webcast & CPE library;
Benchmarking Tools & Research Library.
Please contact me for information about your benefits, or Angela Ruggiero for customer service questions or to make a payment.
Your feedback and advice is important, and we'd like to better understand what you value most about Compliance Week. If you have a moment, please participate in this short two-question survey.
Thank you and best regards,
Angela Ruggiero Business Development (617) 570-8605 angela.ruggiero@complianceweek.com
